name: Asok
character: Modern business district with high-end malls and hotels
notes: Well-lit streets, many legitimate chains like Health Land

name: Nana
character: Mixed commercial area, known for nightlife
notes: Higher concentration of tourist-targeted shops, some require extra caution

name: Phrom Phong
character: Upscale residential and commercial, Japanese expat area
notes: Premium area with many high-quality establishments

name: Thonglor
character: Trendy, upscale neighborhood with cafes and boutiques

name: Ekkamai
notes: Mix of local and tourist-friendly shops

name: Silom
character: Financial district with mix of business and nightlife
notes: Busy area, some areas require caution after dark

name: Victory Monument
notes: Lower prices, mix of quality levels

name: Ratchada
character: Mixed commercial and residential, known for night markets

name: Old City
character: Historic area with temples and tourist attractions
notes: Many tourist-oriented shops, verify before entering
